dataArray.name: Rederly
dataArray.title: Full Stack Principal Software Engineer
bullets: **Responsibilities:** Led a team and we designed and built a platform that allowed professors to organize curriculum and use content from their current WeBWork servers.

**Design:** Application was broken up into an array of dockerized microservices. Some of those microservices were run on AWS ECS and had redundancy and auto scaling. This design increased reliability as well as making it easier to test and do partial deployments. It also allowed for experimentation into other frameworks due to the lower responsibility of each service.
**Frameworks:** Express, React, Sequelize, Prisma, Fastify, Waitress

dataArray.name: Intelligent Product Solutions
dataArray.title: Software Engineer
bullets: **Responsibilities:** Designed and built applications on a wide range of technologies. Set up servers on AWS or Azure running linux to run built applications or in one case to migrate internal Atlassian servers to.
**Languages:** Javascript, Java, Swift, Objective C, C++, C
**Databases:** PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Realm, Mongo, RethinkDB
**Recruitment:** Organized recruitment including documenting processes, documenting questions, orchestrating candidate process

dataArray.name: St. Joseph's College
bullets: **Volunteer Teacher's Assistant:** Helped student's learn Android, debug their code, and give them mock interviews.
**Mobile Code Camp Apps Counsellor (1 week):** Brainstormed with kids about new mobile apps as well as build a small one of their own.
**Minecraft Code Camp Counsellor (1 week):** Taught kids Java to create their own item in Minecraft.
